title: Treasure Forest
description: Following the death of his grandmother, Ben is challenged to retrieve a treasure from the bottom of a pond without disturbing the water, assisted by his sister Sara, a wheelchair-bound private detective with a three-legged bloodhound, an acorn-flute homing device, a wise woman, a mysterious golden thread, and his grandmother's invisible presence. Original. 25,000 first printing.
author: Cat Bordhi
